nodes.text: Fashaka, better known as Fashaka Four-Toes, was a crime lord who lived during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. Notoriously riddled with disease, Fashaka worked with the xenopathologist and combat surgeon Archiban Kimble, better known as "Doc," at one point during the crime lord's career.
Fashaka was first mentioned in the Codex entry for the Jedi Knight companion character Doc in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
